synopsis.text:
Empty, a young girl with no recollection of her past, finds herself in an unfamiliar realm. Here, she crosses paths with the enigmatic Kurumi Tokisaki, who leads her to a school with a peculiar mission: to eliminate Empty. As they arrive, they are greeted by a gathering of girls known as semi-spirits, each with their own motives and desires. As the clock ticks, a thrilling and dangerous battle is about to unfold, marking the beginning of a deadly game in this alternate world.

In a twist of fate, Kurumi Tokisaki stumbles upon a captivating white cat, only to be separated soon after. Little does she know, her curiosity will lead her to Hibiki Higoromo, a white-haired quasi-spirit who reveals the chilling truth: they are all participants in a killing game. With their lives on the line, the girls must fight to be the last one standing and secure a single wish. In this treacherous Neighboring World, Kurumi and Hibiki form a fragile alliance, setting the stage for a series of intense and unpredictable battles.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
